data.message: I am sure someone else asked, but is there anyway to put the stickers in posts rather than just in messages?

replies.message: Hey Jennifer. Stickers are currently only available in chats and messages, but we'll let our team know you're interested in using them in other areas as well! -Ryan
thanks, I LOVE the stickers!!! I was just asking a friend out this the other day...  Maybe Care Bears stickers in the future sometime..
I agree with you Jennifer I would like to be able to use them in posts too

Account Closed Hi Admin I am worried very much regret what happens once more I beg you will give my account back I promise you will not be wrong to say, it is what type .. Araz.alizade95@  gmail.com this is my mail profile that connects back to the Admin profile please help Thank you very much, thank you understand me fall
I have a lot of people that would like the stickers in this area.... they love stickers....LOL
i too would love to be able to use them in posts, but maybe not as large as they are in messages. l
That would be awesome to have more than LIKE or dilike button , MAKE YOUR OWN BUTTON would be nice !!!
To Jennifer: you can save them and then you post
Thanks John I will try that!! like a photo then, right??

Me,too jennifer
I would love to be able to use stickers in posts...lol
